availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael Houze (Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer and private 83rd IN Vol Inf)

body.p: Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer and soldier. Indiana native. Son of John W. Houze and Sarah Houze. Married to Margaret Houze. Student in Switzerland County in 1850. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1860. Served in the 83rd Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 447A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 21.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Indiana, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M540, Roll 0036.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Indiana, 3rd Congressional District, Switzerland County, Vol. 1 of 3, June 1863, p. 237, p. 475 of 554 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on October 5, 2020).
